title: Cyclone = Ciclon
creator_credit: Santiago Alvarez and Instituto Cubano del Arte e Industrias Cinematográficos (ICAIC)
brief_description: A non-narrated film showing the havoc caused by the cyclone which hit the western provinces of Cuba in October, 1963. Reveals the tragic consequences for the poor peasants and also shows the care taken of the injured and the homeless.
creator_credit_for_label: Santiago Alvarez and Instituto Cubano del Arte e Industrias Cinematográficos (ICAIC)
